featured.text: Betty was to accept her friend’s suggestion because she thought she could come up with a better idea herself.

definition.zh_def: 貝蒂是一個女性名字，通常用作貝特麗斯或伊麗莎白的暱稱。
definition.en_def: Betty is a female given name, often used as a diminutive of Beatrice or Elizabeth.
definition.example: Betty loves to bake cookies on the weekends.
